documents.title: New Mexico Data Breach Notification Act
documents.identifier: N.M. Stat. ยง 57-12C-1 et seq.

provisions.title: Notification of security breach
provisions.text: Any person that owns or licenses personal identifying information of a New Mexico resident shall, when the person becomes aware of a security breach, provide notification to each New Mexico resident whose personal identifying information is reasonably believed to have been subject to a security breach. The notification shall be provided within forty-five calendar days following the discovery of a security breach, consistent with the legitimate needs of law enforcement.
